page.title: 14VICTORIA PARK - ILKESTON
page.content: At{Victoria Park} there is something for everyone. For instance adults can{ {listen to the band}on Sunday evenings during summer or relax on the benches in the{beautiful gardens.}There is a part where families can sit and have{ {picnics on the grass.}There are lots of trees with paths wandering through them. For the young, there is{crazy {golf}and an{adventure playground.}Here there are{swings, slides, climbing {frames, barrels that you can run {on,see-saws}and{seats}as well. Tucked away in one corner of the park is a{ {bowling green}for club members. There are also large{greenhouses}where most of the flowers are grown to brighten up the town.There are no fences so everyone is welcome at{Victoria Park.}
